pages.text: The Loot Kit Producer creates loot kits that, when left alone in the floor or right clicked, hatch into precious random mob loot.$(br)The Loot Kit Producer will spawn loot kits directly above it, randomly, and requires a large amount of energy. It may be turned off by providing a redstone signal.
But if you need some specific loot you can always craft the Mob Specific Loot Kits, which will hatch into that mob's specific loot.
